alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lewis County through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Big Moose, or 17 miles northwest of Old Forge, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bremen, Croghan, Belfort, Soft Maple Reservoir, Kirschnerville, Beaver Falls, Indian River and Moshier Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York.
